field.name: summary
field.value: Crash when fast-scrolling on non-syntax-highlighted region

field.name: description
field.value:
Steps to reproduce:
Inside a large HTML ( >1000 lines), insert a large <script> area as well (large enough so you can scroll and see only the contents of the script, w/o any HTML around).
Make sure there's some NVelocity code *inside* the script. Mine was an #if and some variables. My script code also contained a lot of prototype code, so things like $$("table thead th:last-child"), $(var) or $A(array).each(...) were common.
When scrolling very fast, CVSI will somewhat try to colorize that NVelocity, inside the "ignored" script area, and then crash.
I don't remember if I scrolled using the keyboard PgUp/PgDown keys, the mouse wheel, or the scrollbar.
